constants.name: core_transport_identifier
constants.header: Translation table for different types of transport coefficients.

int.name: combined
int.description: Combination of data from available transport models. Representation of the total transport in the system

int.name: background
int.description: Background transport level, ad-hoc transport model not directly related to a physics model

int.name: database
int.description: Transport specified by a database entry external to the dynamic evolution of the plasma

int.name: mhd
int.description: Transport arising from MHD frequency modes

int.name: ntm
int.description: Transport arising from the presence of NTMs

int.name: sawteeth
int.description: Transport arising from the presence of sawteeth

int.name: elm_continuous
int.description: Continuous ELM model --- gives the ELM averaged profile

int.name: pedestal
int.description: Transport level to give edge pedestal
